short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Filter out dealer listings on OLX cars section to easily find cars listed by individual owners

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The OLX Car Owner Filter helps you find genuine individual car sellers on OLX by automatically filtering out dealer listings. This extension makes your car search easier by:

Hiding listings from verified dealers and business sellers
Removing featured/promoted dealer listings
Filtering listings with dealer-specific keywords
Making individual owner listings more visible

Perfect for buyers who prefer dealing directly with car owners rather than dealers or resellers.
Features:

Simple one-click toggle to show/hide dealer listings
Works automatically on OLX car pages
Completely free to use
No account required
Works offline - no data collection

How to use:

Install the extension
Visit OLX cars section
Click the "Hide Dealers" button in the top-right corner
Browse listings from individual sellers
Click again to show all listings
